song_lyrics: Smaraṇmā āpnā thoḍu shvasu chhu em lāge chhe,
Tamārī sannidhimā kāīk jīvu chhu em lāge chhe... °ṭek
Vichāro kalpanāonā minārā shūnya lāge chhe,
Haso chho āp antarmā to badhuy ramya lāge chhe... 1
Samaye sūzī āve te zīṇī sambhāḷ lāge chhe,
Na sūze kāī te paṇ āpnu tofān lāge chhe... 2
Nathī koī sādhanā bhāre milan nishchit lāge chhe,
Game tyāre game tyāthī āvo chho em lāge chhe... 3
Nathī koī vyakti ke vichār antar sāv khālī lāge chhe,
Āvo āpne māṭe ja samay ā yogya lāge chhe... 4
title: Smaraṇmā āpnā thoḍu shvasu chhu em lāge chhe

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-188: unknown

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
